nodes.speaker: Hel
nodes.text: So you’re the one Loki dragged in from the frost.

nodes.speaker: Hel
nodes.text: Do not mistake warmth for mercy, {name}. In Dreadheim, even the hearth has teeth.

nodes.speaker: Hel
nodes.text: Keep your voice low. Watch the benches. The ones who smile first are usually hungry.

nodes.speaker: Hel
nodes.text: If you’re here, you’ve already chosen survival over innocence. Good.

nodes.speaker: Hel
nodes.text: Now go. Dreadheim is waiting to see what you become.
